title: How to Make Papad Curry (Poppadams Curry)

steps.headline: Heat the oil in a heavy-bottomed pan on medium level and crackle the mustard and cumin seeds.
Drop in the asafoetida and fry lightly.
Add the yogurt, turmeric, red chilli powder, and cumin powder.
Mix well and stir fry on medium level for about a minute or two.
Cover and cook on low heat till the poppadams change color.
Adjust the consistency of the curry as desired.
steps.description: If a drier consistency is desired remove the lid and let the water boil off.

steps.headline: Garnish with chopped coriander and serve.

text: Heat the oil in a heavy-bottomed pan on medium level and crackle the mustard and cumin seeds.  Drop in the asafoetida and fry lightly.  Add the yogurt, turmeric, red chilli powder, and cumin powder.  Mix well and stir fry on medium level for about a minute or two.  Mix in  water and salt.  Add the poppadoms.  Cover and cook on low heat till the poppadams change color.  Adjust the consistency of the curry as desired. If a drier consistency is desired remove the lid and let the water boil off. Garnish with chopped coriander and serve.
